markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slippers of Spider Climbing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=465)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These soft slippers are made of fine gray silk. If the slippers are left unattended for a while, they tend to attract spiders that nest inside.

</column>
